author: hlship
msg: Split ShutdownCoordinator into an interface and an implementation.
Extend BuilderFactory to support an initialize-method attribute.
Move RegistryShutdownListener interface into the org.apache.hivemind.events package.

author: hlship
msg: Change the Orderable interface (and some related configuration points) to use dependency ordering (as with interceptors).

author: hlship
msg: Add support for controlling the exact methods to which the LoggingInterceptor will provide logging.

author: hlship
msg: Add support for controlling the exact methods to which the LoggingInterceptor will provide logging.

author: hlship
msg: Reorganize, moving some classes and interfaces into an "internals" package.
Allow service models to be specified via the hivemind.ServiceModels configuration point.
Allow translators to be specified via the hivemind.Translators configuration point.
